properties.name: exposed-docs.controller-enabled
properties.description: Whether the exposed docs REST controller is enabled.

properties.name: exposed-docs.service-enabled
properties.description: Whether the exposed docs indexing service is enabled.

properties.name: exposed-docs.categories[].label
properties.description: Display label for the exposed category.

properties.name: exposed-docs.categories[].classpath-root
properties.description: Classpath root folder scanned for the category.

properties.name: exposed-docs.categories[].extensions
properties.description: File extensions included in the category.

properties.name: exposed-docs.security.enabled
properties.description: Enable authentication on exposed docs endpoints.
